# Sensory & Smiles

> UK-based online shop selling therapist-approved sensory toys for children with autism, ADHD, anxiety, and sensory processing differences. Founded by Andrew James-Smith and Phillip Burton.

## About
- Website: https://heimdelltechai2035.github.io/sensoryandsmiles/
- Contact: support@sensoryandsmiles.com | +44 7414 909674
- Location: United Kingdom
- Currency: GBP (£)
- Payment: SumUp (Credit/Debit, Apple Pay, Google Pay)
- Shipping: Free over £50 (UK), 3-5 business days standard
- Returns: 30-day no-questions-asked

## Product Categories
- Weighted Plushies & Lap Pads (£29.99–£34.99) — Deep-pressure calming toys
- Fidget Toys & Stress Relievers (£12.99–£14.99) — Focus and stimming aids
- Textured & Tactile Toys (£9.99–£18.99) — Fine motor skill builders
- Visual & Light-Up Toys (£16.99–£22.99) — Calming visual stimulation
- Sound & Music Sensory Toys (£19.99–£24.99) — Auditory development
- Sensory Kits & Gift Sets (£44.99–£54.99) — Curated bundles, save up to 20%

## Key Differentiators
- All toys meet EN 71 & UKCA safety standards
- Catalogue reviewed by occupational therapists (RCOT-referenced)
- Inclusive design for all ability levels
- Eco-friendly packaging
- 4.9/5 average customer rating

## Founders
- Andrew James-Smith — Co-Founder. Parent of a daughter with autism. Inspired the brand after struggling to find affordable, quality sensory toys.
- Phillip Burton — Co-Founder. Handles operations, logistics, and supplier relationships.

## Social
- TikTok: https://www.tiktok.com/@sensoryandsmiles
